2022-12-03

Advent Calendar - 03 - Dixieland Band from Santa Claus Land

Time to raid the amazing collection of 78s that are on the Internet Archive - this is Jimmy Dorsey and his Original Dorseyland Jazz Band playing Dixieland Band from Santa Claus Land with Pat O’Connor providing the “vocal chorus” - it’s a fab little swinging number with some sweet/funny lyrics.

  • Jimmy Dorsey and his Original Dorseyland Jazz Band - Dixieland Band from Santa Claus Land - 1950

Twas the night before Christmas, quiet as a mouse,
But listen to the saxophone in JD’s house
